tables.name: Account
tables.technical: Primary key: id (UUID4), stores user credentials, permissions, external_id for SSO

tables.name: Wallet
tables.technical: Primary key: id, foreign key: user → Account.id, stores adminkey, inkey, balance

tables.name: Payment
tables.technical: Primary key: checking_id, foreign key: wallet_id → Wallet.id, tracks all payments

tables.name: AccessControlList
tables.technical: Primary key: id, manages API permissions and endpoints

tables.name: UserAcls
tables.technical: Primary key: id, user-specific permissions and ACLs

lnurlp.name: Pay Links
lnurlp.description: Create static payment links and Lightning Addresses
lnurlp.technical: LNURL-pay implementation with Lightning Address support

tables.name: PayLink
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores payment link configuration

tables.name: LnurlpSettings
tables.technical: Stores Nostr private key for zaps functionality

withdraw.name: Withdraw Links
withdraw.description: Create LNURL withdraw links for users

tables.name: WithdrawLink
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, manages withdrawal links

boltcards.name: Bolt Cards
boltcards.technical: NXP NTAG424 Bolt Card implementation with one-time LNURLw

tables.name: BoltCard
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores card data and settings

satspay.name: SatsPay Server
satspay.description: Accept Bitcoin payments on your website or app
satspay.technical: Creates onchain and Lightning invoices for web integration

tables.name: SatsPayCharge
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores charge configurations

tables.name: SatsPayPayment
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks SatsPay transactions

boltz.name: Boltz
boltz.description: Swap between onchain and Lightning payments

tables.name: BoltzSwap
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, manages swap operations

watchonly.name: Onchain Wallet
watchonly.technical: Watch-only wallet implementation for onchain monitoring

tables.name: WatchOnlyWallet
tables.technical: Foreign key: user → Account.id, stores address and settings

nostrmarket.name: Nostr Market
nostrmarket.technical: Nostr webshop/marketplace integration with Lightning payments

tables.name: NostrProduct
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores product information

tables.name: NostrOrder
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks marketplace orders

nostrrelay.name: Nostr Relay
nostrrelay.technical: One-click Nostr relay deployment and management

tables.name: NostrRelay
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, manages relay settings

nostrclient.name: Nostr Client
nostrclient.technical: Nostr event multiplexer and client functionality

tables.name: NostrClient
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores client settings

tables.name: NostrNip5
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, manages NIP-5 addresses

satsdice.name: Sats Dice
satsdice.technical: LNURL Satoshi dice implementation with provable fairness

tables.name: SatsDiceGame
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, manages game sessions

tables.name: SatsDiceBet
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks individual bets

tables.name: CoinflipGame
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, manages coinflip games

tables.name: CoinflipBet
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks coinflip bets

numbers.name: Numbers
numbers.technical: A provably fair numbers game powered by Bitcoin block data

tables.name: NumbersGame
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, manages numbers games

tables.name: NumbersBet
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks number bets

eightball.name: Magic 8ball
eightball.technical: Pay sats to get random words/responses

tables.name: EightballGame
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, manages 8ball games

tables.name: EightballResponse
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks 8ball responses

events.name: Events
events.description: Sell event tickets and manage attendees
events.technical: Event ticket sales and registration system

tables.name: Event
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores event details

tables.name: EventTicket
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks ticket sales

invoices.name: Invoices
invoices.technical: Professional invoice creation and management system

tables.name: Invoice
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores invoice details

tables.name: InvoicePayment
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks invoice payments

paywall.name: Paywall
paywall.technical: Content paywall system with Lightning payments

tables.name: Paywall
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores paywall settings

tables.name: PaywallAccess
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks paywall access

bitcoinswitch.name: Bitcoin Switch
bitcoinswitch.technical: IoT device control via Lightning payments

tables.name: BitcoinSwitch
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores switch settings

tables.name: SwitchAction
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks switch activations

lnurldevice.name: LNURLDevices
lnurldevice.technical: Points of sale, ATMs, switches via LNURL

tables.name: LNURLDevice
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores device settings

tables.name: TipJar
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores tip jar settings

tables.name: Tip
tables.technical: Links to core Payment table, tracks individual tips

streamalerts.name: Stream Alerts
streamalerts.technical: Streaming platform integration for Bitcoin donations

tables.name: StreamAlert
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores alert settings

copilot.name: Streamer Copilot
copilot.technical: Streaming tools with Lightning payment integration

tables.name: CopilotAlert
tables.technical: Foreign key: wallet → Wallet.id, stores alert settings

core.name: Core LNbits
core.description: Core database tables for LNbits functionality

hardware.name: Hardware & IoT
hardware.description: Hardware and IoT device control extensions
